programme.title: Atlanta Olympics 1996
programme.short_synopsis: The economy of sport and the 1996 Olympic Games.
programme.medium_synopsis: The commercialisation and crass television coverage of the 1996 Olympic Games in Atlanta, and the effect that an influx of money has on sport.
